title: Shein pulls ad featuring accused killer Luigi Mangione
description: The image of Mangione seen on Shein was either generated by Artificial Intelligence or was photoshopped.
content:

title: Subdued Decision in Google Antitrust Trial May Help Keep a Monopoly in Power
description: After a five-year legal showdown pitting the U.S. Department of Justice against Google, a federal judge concluded that the disruptive forces of artificial intelligence technology will have a better chance of hobbling an illegal monopoly than any restraints imposed by a court order.
content: After a five-year legal showdown pitting the U.S. Department of Justice against Google, a federal judge concluded that the disruptive forces of artificial intelligence technology will have a better chance of hobbling an illegal monopoly than any rest... [6402 chars]

title: Reese Witherspoon slammed for 'pushing' AI in filmmaking as she's accused of 'sidelining regular people'
description: Reese Witherspoon is under fire for backing artificial intelligence as the future of filmmaking - with critics blasting her as a 'Hollywood elitist' who can afford to praise it while others suffer.
content:

title: UK content creators land two spots in shortlist of ‘Grammys for AI’ music awards
description: Spotlighting artists from across the globe who are “harnessing artificial intelligence to tell deeply human stories”, the Future Sound Awards – dubbed “The Grammys” for AI music – has unveiled its Top 15 shortlist of tracks.
content:

title: ServiceNow offers 70% discount to federal government in AI push
description: ServiceNow Inc. is offering federal agencies discounts of as much as 70% on its software, a move aimed at spurring adoption as the Trump administration presses for faster government implementation of artificial intelligence tools.

title: Starbucks rolls out AI for inventory counting
description: Starbucks is rolling out a new system for counting inventory that uses artificial intelligence technology to its more than 11,000 company-owned stores in North America by the end of September, the global coffee chain announced on Wednesday.
